title: A Student on a TV Show Could Win Big for Her University
summary: Jade Scott is a student at the University of Warwick who is on a TV show called Traitors. She is trying to win £120,000. Her friends Ethan and Jenny know her from school, where she helps them in labs. They say she is serious and focused, which might help her on the show. Jade is studying women's health and likes playing video games. Her friends think she is being herself on TV. Ethan hopes she wins because it would be great for their university. The article talks about how her friends support her and think her win would bring good attention to Warwick.

keywords.explanation: a TV show where people compete to win money
a person who helps students in science labs
studying how to keep women healthy

questions.question: What is Jade's role at school according to the article?

background_read: This article is about a student named Jade Scott who is on a popular TV competition called Traitors. She studies at the University of Warwick and helps other students in labs. Her friends think her serious nature might help her win money on the show. If she wins, it could make her university more famous. The story shows how real people can be on TV and how their actions affect others.
Article_Structure: WHO: Jade Scott, a student at University of Warwick, and her friends Ethan and Jenny
WHAT: Jade is competing on the TV show Traitors to win £120,000, and her friends support her
WHERE: The University of Warwick and the TV show Traitors
WHY: To show how Jade's participation could bring positive attention to her university

perspectives.description: Ethan and Jenny believe Jade's serious and true-to-self attitude will help her succeed on the show and benefit their university.
